external_games.name: The Pirate's Fate - Prisoner of Destiny Expansion

name: The Pirate's Fate: Prisoner of Destiny
summary: What would have happened if Mila had volunteered to stay behind at the Cursed Coast instead of Darious? Find out in this all-new path in The Pirate's Fate - Prisoner of Destiny. What price will you pay for escaping the dungeon? Will your long-lost friends remember who you really are?
